description:
Remember, remember, this fifth of November, not to celebrate bonfire night in California, where woke diversity targets for fire departments are putting hiring "compassionate" women above men who can do the job.

The post No Time to DEI: Woke Firefighting is Going to Get Someone Killed appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No Time to DEI: Woke Firefighting is Going to Get Someone Killed

description:
Kemi Badenoch's new Shadow Education Minister, Neil O'Brien, backed keeping schools closed during Covid lockdowns and said Prof Sunetra Gupta and other lockdown sceptics "have a hell of a lot to answer for".

The post New Shadow Education Minister Backed Keeping Schools Closed During Lockdown and Said Lockdown Sceptics “Have a Hell of a Lot to Answer For” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: New Shadow Education Minister Backed Keeping Schools Closed During Lockdown and Said Lockdown Sceptics “Have a Hell of a Lot to Answer For”

description:
Labour is poised today to announce the first rise in university tuition fees in eight years, setting them on course to exceed £10,000. In 2020, Keir Starmer pledged to "support the abolition of tuition fees".

The post Labour Poised to Increase University Tuition Fees appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour Poised to Increase University Tuition Fees

description:
The town of Broken Hill in Australia was supposed to showcase running an electricity grid entirely on renewable energy – until, just two weeks in, a single storm left the population without power for days.

The post The Town in Australia Run Entirely on Renewable Energy Where a Single Storm Left the Population Without Power for Days appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Town in Australia Run Entirely on Renewable Energy Where a Single Storm Left the Population Without Power for Days

description:
Roger Watson is in Washington D.C., a city completely in the grip of Harris-Walz mania. Every banner, button or shout-out is for Kamala Harris. It's a bubble completely detached from the country it governs.

The post Postcard from Washington D.C. appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Postcard from Washington D.C.

description:
Bridget Phillipson is bracing for a High Court showdown as the Free Speech Union gears up to challenge her decision to halt free speech laws designed to protect academics from cancel culture.

The post Education Secretary Faces Court Over Shelving Free Speech Laws appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Education Secretary Faces Court Over Shelving Free Speech Laws

description:
Labour's Budget won't cut bills but will cause green levies to skyrocket, locking households into soaring energy costs, warns Paul Homewood.

The post Prepare for Renewable Subsidies to Rocket appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Prepare for Renewable Subsidies to Rocket

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
